alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 2:13AM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6,500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties above 6,500 ft. * WHEN...Today through 5 AM MST Saturday. The majority of the snowfall will occur prior to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially along Highway 191 in northern Greenlee county.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
